snippet.title: Saga of the Nine Worlds   The Gathering Collector's Edition
snippet.description:
Eipix Entertainment invites you to take a legendary journey through the Nine Worlds in their all-new series!

A peaceful morning in Midgard is rocked by a dragon attack! You quickly set out with your princess to track down the beast and destroy it, but are attacked along the way. You should have died… but you were saved. It seems the gods have chosen you for a very special task – save the world! The gods believe you are worthy. Now you need only prove it. Gather your companions and set out on a journey through the mythical Nine Worlds in this this epic hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

• Escape the Ship of the Dead in the bonus chapter!
• Never get lost with the helpful strategy guide.
• Scour locations and HOPs for collectibles.
• Enjoy concept art, music, achievements, and more!
